channel.title: Coordinates problem
channel.description: Hey, I would like to see the coords i'm on can someone help me to do that? Is that about source or client, Idk but i post this to client and server help. Yea help please. And I want it like where are run energy shown, there should be coords all the time, not a command thanks! Deltascape source

item.title: Coordinates problem
item.dc:creator: @TheGamers TheGamers
item.description:
@TheGamers wrote:

Type ::mypos and it’ll work i believe.

Read full topic
